description: Miami is home to some of the greatest Latin American cuisine in the world and RickRey’s Peruvian Fusion, although small, is dishing out big portions with such big flavors there’s no doubt that they’re a mighty contribution to the sweet heat of The Magic City. You can find RickRey’s cruising the beaches and serving authentic recipes straight from ‘From Our Wok to Your Plate.' Check out their delicious Lomo Saltado (strips of sirloin steak) and Chicken Saltado (strips of chicken breast) that are stir fried and flamed with the use of a wok by combining Peruvian spices, thinly sliced tomatoes and purple onions, and chopped cilantro, and are served on a bed of white rice and fries, or as a sandwich if you’re munching on the go. If you’re craving flavor and freshness, then this incredible food from Peru is the the right choice for you!
name: RickRey's Peruvian Fusion
